thread.title: LootLove claps back at 'sex symbol' accusations
thread.title_full: LootLove claps back at 'sex symbol' accusations

title: LootLove claps back at 'sex symbol' accusations
text:
"LootLove don't you think you're sending a wrong message ngawe that you're a sex symbol..Don't get me wrong sisi plz," said the follower. 
LootLove wasted no time in responding with a spicy clapback. Wrong message? What? That I love my body & celebrate it? That I'm comfortable & ndiz'thembile? That I'm sexy and I'm quite alright widdit? https://t.co/NMoINq6lhw — KING LOOT. (@LootLove) February 5, 2017 Remember one thing: MY BODY. I do what I want with it️ https://t.co/NMoINq6lhw — KING LOOT. (@LootLove) February 5, 2017 
And just so you know, here's one of those saucy snaps just for reference. Jan 29, 2017 at 8:15am PST Share
